thread.title: Dying and abandoned dog given a new life by rescuer (11 Photos)
thread.title_full: Dying and abandoned dog given a new life by rescuer (11 Photos)

author: Matt
title: Dying and abandoned dog given a new life by rescuer (11 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
The Animal Cruelty Division of Austin, Texas made a heartbreaking discovery recently, when they were tipped off about a caged and dying pup. When they arrive, she was almost dead, severely emaciated and was covered in her own feces. They were not expecting the dog to make it. 2 
As detective Eva Wagner described, 
“We realized [the dog] was alive, but just barely, so we rushed her to the Austin Animal Center where vets began emergency treatment. Her temperature was too low to even register on a thermometer and she wasn’t moving at all. We didn’t think there was any way she would survive.” 3
